body:
just got banned from nexus for kill aura, I can assure you I do not hack. 

Heres a vid literally seconds after it happened

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xh-8eV2oDws&feature=youtu.be
I would love to see evidence of my supposed 'kill aura'
